title: Trace
description: Originally produced in 2006 with roots in Goa trance, 'Trace' resurfaces after years underground, refined into a deeper, more cinematic form of melodic techno. It's a track that bridges past and present, carrying the pulse of its origins into a more mature, immersive soundscape.

title: To The Top
description: With gentle synth layers, a beautiful melody, and an undercurrent of quiet determination, it captures the feeling of focused ascent, driven not by force, but by inner resolve.

title: Summer Rain
description: A gentle blend of ambient textures and slow beats, this track captures the feeling of wandering through an enchanted forest in the rain, where every drop reveals hidden light and color.

title: Starlightning
description: Starlightning blends soft pulsing synths with warm downtempo rhythms, evoking the quiet charge of a night sky. A melancholic melody arcs like lightning, brief and brilliant, set against a backdrop of cosmic calm and subtle wonder.

title: The Only One
description: 'To Only One' is a sarcastic reflection on love, sacrifice, and identity. It questions whether the problem lies in giving too much or too little, choosing the wrong person or failing to be the right one. With playful irony and a hint of truth, the song captures the emotional tangle of devotion and regret.

title: Soul In Solitude
description: A melancholic downtempo trance journey. It drifts through vast emotional landscapes, blending lush textures, ethereal synths, and reflective stillness. A soundtrack for moments of quiet introspection and distant light.
